title: Novell's adventures in orange-and-white XML buttons
summary:
Dave says:

Novell now has a white-on-orange XML button on its Cool Solutions home page.
They've got more than that. In case you haven't seen it, they've got an entire fleet of Novell newsfeeds in RSS:

http://www.novell.com/newsfeeds/
